nodes.text: Mina Bonteri's house was the home of Separatist Senator Mina Bonteri and her son, Lux. It was located on Raxus Secundus. The house had a small landing pad, situated right in front of the staircase into the main building.

Around 21 BBY, Padmé Amidala and Ahsoka Tano secretly visited Mina Bonteri on the planet Raxus Secundus to achieve the peaceful settlement with the Separatists. During this time, they stayed at her house.
